mapper.insert:
insert into option_parent values (nextval('option_parent_no_seq') , #{name })
select currval('option_parent_no_seq')

insert into option_child(no, name, option_parent_no) values (nextval('option_child_no_seq') , #{name }, #{parentNo})
select currval('option_child_no_seq')
mapper.select: select * from( select oc.no as no, oc.name as name, oc.option_parent_no as parentNo, op.name as parentName from option_child oc, (select distinct a.option_child1_no from (select * from product_detail where product_no=#{no }) a) b, option_parent op where oc.no=b.option_child1_no and oc.option_parent_no=op.no union select oc.no as no, oc.name as name, oc.option_parent_no as parentNo, op.name as parentName from option_child oc, (select distinct a.option_child2_no from (select * from product_detail where product_no=#{no }) a) b, option_parent op where oc.no=b.option_child2_no and oc.option_parent_no=op.no ) c order by c.parentNo, c.no
